title: An Act relative to liability for accidents and collisions with vulnerable road users involving large motor vehicles and trailers

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Brownsberger, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1036) of William N. Brownsberger for legislation relative to liability for accidents and collisions with vulnerable road users involving large motor vehicles and trailers.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
